content.title: Fredrick Defamont
content.body:
Wessex warned me of Defamont - explaining that he heads the Cyborg Defamation Foundation, how he doesn't leave any survivors, and how he's hiding many secrets of his own.
Defamont is relentless, and will stop at nothing to get a kill. He despises everyone who doesn’t stay “pure”, though the reasons why elude even the most observant of sleuths...
I must take care to avoid him.... and his goons.
